name: Cutlassed
description:
In this game you play as a pirate hell bent on taking coins from the dead.  Fight your way through death itself at times to reach your goal.

Primary Controls - A D (Movement), W (Jump) and Space (attack)

Development Team: Jan Molina, Joseph Kunsman, Tyler Forrester, Michael Frank, Noah Goodman, and Dudley Girard.

Main Coders: Jan Molina, Joseph Kunsman, and Tyler Forrester, Ryan Carroll

Main Art: Michael Frank and Noah Goodman

Land tile set from open game art (planned to be replaced in Version 2).

Some sound effects from freesound.org

Main Sound: Jan Molina

Story:  All
developers: Game Dev Club of Shippensburg University
